籤詩版本二:
Mufaro uri pamberi pangu hausi mufaro, uye hausi kugadzikana panguva dzenjodzi.
Sei zvakakosha kucheka nyama kuti ugadzirise maronda?Zviri nani kumirira nguva uye kugadzirisa maronda → anova maronda.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi yakafanana nekucheka nyama kuita maronda.
Zvinhu zvose zvinofanira kuitwa nenguva.
解曰: Kana uchiziva kumira, mira. Ziva kuzviregerera. Cheka nyama yako. General kurwadziwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Sun Bin akabatwa uye Pang Juan akabatwa
Munguva yeHondo dzeNyika, Sun Bin aive chizvarwa cheQi. Pang Juan aive chizvarwa cheWei. Ainamatawo Gui Guzi semudzidzisi wake.
Sun Bin aive nani pakudzidza kupfuura Pang Juan.Pang Juan paakanga ari mutungamiriri wemauto mudunhu reWei, akarwa naSun Bin muhondo yehungwaru uye akavenga Sun Bin paakakundwa.
Akashandisa zano rekudimbura tsoka dzaSun Bin.Pave paye, Sun Bin akabva aita seanopenga achibva akwanisa kutiza.
Mambo Wei weQi akashandisa Sun Bin sechipangamazano wake wechiuto. Tungamira mauto kurwisa Wei.
Sun Bin akashandisa nzira yekunyepedzera kuderedza simba remuvengi uye kuwedzera mauto ake muchivande. Akanyengera Pang Juan ndokumudzingirira kuMaling Road. Akapfurwa akafa nemusoja aiva akavandira neuta.
聖意: Kusagadzikana kumba, kutaura wega, kutsvaga hupfumi, bhizinesi risingafadzi, wanano yewakaipa haitore nguva refu, Liujia, vanhu vanovharira minda, kukuvadzwa kwemakonye esirika, kukuvara kwezvipfuyo zvitanhatu, kutsvaga vanhu, mhosva dzisiri dzeruzhinji, kurasikirwa, kutama, kuchengetedza, kurasika. pfuma, yakaoma kuwana, urwere, makuva anodzokororwa mumakomo, zvisina kunaka
古人: Sun Bin akabatwa uye Pang Juan akabatwa
